fields.description: Count of components/versions now violating a policy rule
URL to the resource representing the violated rule
Name of the violated policy rule
Severity of the violated policy rule
URL for the resource representing the component the violation occurred for, if applicable
URL for the resource representing the component version the violation occurred for, if applicable
Name of the component the violation occurred for
Name of the component version the violation occurred for, if applicable
URL for the resource representing the status of the policy violation
URL to a resource representing issues filed for the violating component
URL(s) to the resource(s) representing the violated rule(s)
URL for the resource representing the bill of materials entry in violation
Name of the project the policy violation occurred in
URL for the resource representing the project version the policy violation occurred in
Name of the project version the policy violation occurred in
